Keywords: Cosmic , Guardians of the Galaxy , Soldier
Real Name: Peter Quill
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY THEMED TEAM: If Star-Lord is part of the listed themed team, he has: "When a friendly character with the Guardians of the Galaxy keyword misses with an attack, give Star-Lord a Plan token. // FREE: Remove up to 3 Plan tokens. Until your next turn, Star-Lord can use Perplex and can use it a number of times equal to the number of Plan tokens removed."
Special Powers
RECRUITER: POWER: Choose a character with the Guardians of the Galaxy keyword in your KO area that hasn't been chosen for or generated by a Recruiter effect. If you do, generate a character with the Guardians of the Galaxy keyword from your Sideline that has a lower point value than the chosen character. This game, the generated character can't be replaced and your opponent scores them immediately instead of when it's KO'd.
I GOT PART OF A PLAN: At the beginning of your turn, choose two. Star-Lord can use the chosen effects until he chooses again:
*Energy Explosion
*Precision Strike
*Pulse Wave
*Star-Lord has "FREE: Knock back all adjacent opposing characters 2 squares."
Trade Star-Lord Want Star-Lord

Comments
December 8, 2022
nelson2208
Love the diversity of his attack power to represent a character that doesn't always "follow the rules."
December 2, 2022
pokolo
End dial reducers always feel pointless to me, especially toughness, combat reflexes would be better there
November 17, 2022
Oathful
I find this dial design weird but fun, simulating being able to take a punch not by giving reducers, but by giving a character a lot of clicks. Recruiter is kind of gimmicky, but still fun in casual and has limited usability in competitive. The attack power and Team-Up ability are really what make this Star-Lord shine, the versatility mixed with a support power that can pivot tempo back in your favor are really nice on a long dial like this. About as much as I could ask for from the first remake of Peter in years, although I'm still waiting for them to clix a Sun Lord version of him (yay hippie space jesus). // Thematic: 8.5/10, Viability: 8/10 -OR- 8.75/10 (Team-Up), Fun Factor: 9/10, leans towards balanced fun.
